meaningMnemonic: <radical>Angle</radical> your <radical>sword</radical> correctly at this <radical>cow</radical> to <kanji>solve</kanji> its riddle. The key is to <kanji>untie</kanji> the cow with the sword without hurting it.
readingMnemonic: Did I mention that you have to <kanji>solve</kanji> this whole riddle while on a <reading>kay</reading>ak (かい)? No?! Whoops.
